titleStmt.title: Miracles of art and nature, or, A brief description of the several varieties of birds, beasts, fishes, plants, and fruits of other countreys : together with several other remarkable things in the world by R.B., Gent.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

notesStmt.note: R.B. stands for Richard or Robert Burton, the pseudonym of Nathaniel Crouch.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
